ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: CCA input file
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Environmental data for each population was extracted from a shapefile provided in the Canadian EcoAtlas (available at: http://www.data.gc.ca/data/en/dataset/9099a060-77ea-57f6-b1b9-50f9eeef435b)and pollen data were downloaded from the Neotoma Database (http://www.neotomadb.org/). CCA was performed using the Vegan package 2.0 in R 3.0.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: chloroplast DNA
conifers
gene flow
hybrid zone
introgression
mitochondrial DNA
pollen analysis
species delimitation
